\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[196ae4117aab1385b7a96e475638860d]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={82}
\begin{aligned}
y_{i}^{k+1} &=\beta y_{i}^{k}+\lambda_{i} x_{i}^{k} \\
x_{i}^{k+1} &=x_{i}^{k}-\alpha y_{i}^{k+1}
\end{aligned}   
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={87}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a31a860e7a59c7616c1515ec3ae652a6]%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[795cb8c493e4ff97555e1621f5cbfb8b]%mdk
$y_{i}^{k+1} =\beta y_{i}^{k}+\lambda_{i} x_{i}^{k}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={90}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[2ee8d4335cf25ce81cefd4bb64cda30d]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={94}
\left(\begin{array}{c}
y_{i}^{k} \\
x_{i}^{k}
\end{array}\right)=R^{k}\left(\begin{array}{c}
y_{i}^{0} \\
x_{i}^{0}
\end{array}\right) \quad R=\left(\begin{array}{cc}
\beta & \lambda_{i} \\
-\alpha \beta & 1-\alpha \lambda_{i}
\end{array}\right)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
